__GlobalAccessControlManaged_init(addres.details: this is assumed to be used in the initializer of the inhereiting contract

params._globalAccessControl: global access control which is pinged to allow / deny access to permissioned calls by role

params._daoId: ID of DAO to vote for
params._proof: Merkle proof for the guestlist. Use `new bytes32[](0)` if there's no guestlist

finalize().details: Ensure contract has enough `tokenOut` before calling

returns.limitLeft_: Amount of `tokenIn` that can still be exchanged

params._guestlist: Address that will manage auction approvals
params._saleDuration: The duration of the token sale
params._saleRecipient: The address receiving the proceeds of the sale - will be citadel multisig
params._saleStart: The time when tokens can be first purchased
params._tokenIn: The token this contract will receive in a trade
params._tokenInLimit: The max tokenIn that the contract can take
params._tokenOut: The token this contract will return in a trade (citadel)

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns.hasEnded_: True if the sale has ended

sweep(address).details: The contract transfers all `tokenIn` directly to `saleRecipient` during a sale so it's safe      to sweep `tokenIn`. For `tokenOut`, the function only sweeps the extra amount      (current contract balance - amount left to be claimed)

claim().notice: Claim bought tokens after sale has been finalized

finalize().notice: Finalize the sale after sale duration. Can only be called by owner

finalized().notice: whether the sale has been finalized

getAmountOut(uint256).notice: Get the amount received when exchanging `tokenIn`

getTokenInLimitLeft().notice: Check how much `tokenIn` can still be taken in

hasClaimed(address).notice: Whether an account has claimed tokens NOTE: can reset boughtAmounts after a claim to optimize gas       but we need to persist boughtAmounts

saleDuration().notice: duration of the token sale, cannot purchase afterwards

saleEnded().notice: Check if the sale has ended

saleRecipient().notice: address receiving the proceeds of the sale - will be citadel multisig

saleStart().notice: time when tokens can be first purchased

setGuestlist(address).notice: Update the guestlist address. Can only be called by owner

setSaleDuration(uint256).notice: Update sale duration. Can only be called by owner

setSaleRecipient(address).notice: Update the `tokenIn` receipient address. Can only be called by owner

setSaleStart(uint256).notice: Update the sale start time. Can only be called by owner

setTokenInLimit(uint256).notice: Modify the max tokenIn that this contract can take. Can only be called by owner

setTokenOutPrice(uint256).notice: Modify the tokenOut price in. Can only be called by owner

sweep(address).notice: Transfers out any tokens accidentally sent to the contract. Can only be called by owner

tokenIn().notice: token to take in WBTC / bibbtc LP / CVX / bveCVX

tokenInLimit().notice: Max tokenIn that can be taken by the contract (defines the cap for tokenOut sold)

tokenOutPrice().notice: tokenIn per tokenOut price eg. 1 WBTC (8 decimals) = 40,000 CTDL ==> price = 10^8 / 40,000
